data.subject: concept:purine-biosynthesis

provenance.source_document: Nucleotide Biosynthesis (slides text provided by user)
provenance.section_title: Learning Objectives / Major differences from purine biosynthesis
provenance.raw_text:
Identify the differences between purine and pyrimidine synthesis 
pathways.
...
Major differences from purine biosynthesis:

• Fewer precursors

• Base built first, then condensed with PRPP

data.notes: Slides explicitly prompt identification of differences and list major differences.

data.subject: method:aspartate-transcarbamoylase

provenance.source_document: Nucleotide Biosynthesis (slides text provided by user)
provenance.section_title: Feedback inhibition is an important regulator of nucleotide synthesis

Aspartate transcarbamoylase is inhibited 
by CTP

data.notes: ATCase inhibition by CTP is presented as an instance of feedback inhibition.

data.subject: concept:air

provenance.source_document: Nucleotide Biosynthesis (slides text provided by user)
provenance.section_title: Part II: Generating the 6-membered ring
provenance.raw_text:
AIR + CO2 + Aspartate 
+ Formate + ATP → 
Inosinate (IMP)

data.notes: AIR is an input for the reaction producing IMP.
